nodes.text: The Neimoidian soldier beetle was a type of beetle from the planet Neimoidia. The Sheathipede-class transport shuttle built by Haor Chall Engineering Corporation was roughly shaped like a Neimoidian soldier beetle.
The Neimoidian soldier beetle was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
